snippet.title: Wizardry VII - Crusaders of the Dark Savant gameplay (PC Game, 1992)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Wizardry VII - Crusaders of the Dark Savant, Dos PC game produced by Sir-tech Software in 1992 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/wizardry-vii-crusaders-of-the-dark-savant/5004/
Arranging a fellowship of six Crusader of Dark Savant and starting the quest.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Akalabeth - https://youtu.be/jNlEfzXi8D0
Wizardry VI - https://youtu.be/VTnO3-2Sq7U
Reaping the Dungeon - https://youtu.be/vL8nh0pZTTA
